attributes.action: Make the same info available to both sides for a balanced debate to take place
attributes.additional_details:
I see the  TV news & various TV political shows & read  newspapers on my Kindle . There is not a sensible balance of information for the voter to access .
All the media & politicians etc  are doing is building a circus of miss information .
Political sniping is now the norm , this referendum is far more important than a snipers war .. The politicians are supposed to represent our  views  but we are being blindfolded by them & the media at every stage & step of the way to the referendum .
attributes.background: Information for the referendum  is not giving out the same facts to both sides . How can it be considered democratic .
